title: Experiment Configuration
description: Schema for an experiment configuration document stored in Firestore.

id.description: Unique identifier for the experiment (often the Firestore document ID itself).

description.description: A human-readable description of the experiment.

creation_date.description: Timestamp of when the experiment configuration was created.

last_modified_date.description: Timestamp of when the experiment configuration was last modified.

tags.description: Tags for categorizing or searching experiments.

status.description: Current status of the experiment design.

padres_task_name.description: The name of the task to be run in the Padres environment.

padres_task_parameters.description: Specific parameters for the Padres task.

llm_mcp_server_name.description: Name of the LLM MCP server to use (e.g., 'claude_opus', 'openai_gpt4_turbo'). This should match a server configured in MCPManager.

prompt_template_id.description: ID of the prompt template to use (from a Firestore 'prompt_templates' collection).

prompt_parameters.description: Key-value pairs to fill in the prompt template.

max_turns_per_trial.description: Maximum number of turns or steps allowed for each trial of the experiment.

num_trials.description: Number of trials to run for this experiment configuration.

evaluation_metrics.description: List of metrics that will be used to evaluate the experiment's success (e.g., 'success_rate', 'average_score', 'steps_to_completion').

output_bigquery_table.description: Optional: Specific BigQuery table to store results for this experiment, if overriding default.

custom_metadata.description: Any other custom metadata for this experiment configuration.
